title: Find The Missing Boots
content:
. Who ask you to track down a runaway slave with a pair of boots that belong to the duergar's sergeant. If you decide to obey his orders, you need to travel to the Myconid colony, the runaway slave Thulla is standing next to Spaw. You can take away the Boots (Boots of Speed) and return them to Sergeant Thrinn. She can be found at the Grymforge.

How to unlock Find The Missing Boots

Underdark - Beach

Find The Missing Boots Rewards

If you give the Boots of Speed to Sergeant Thrinn you can choos
